template.template: Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist
template.name: Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist

item.name: Iostat output generated
item.key: system.run["iostat -xyd 1 1 | tail -n+3 | head -n -1 2>/dev/null >> /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log && cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | tr '\n' '\r' | sed -r 's/(.?*)Device(.*)/Device\2/g' | tr '\r' '\n' | tee /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log >/dev/null && echo 1 || echo 0"]

discovery_rule.name: Disks discovery
discovery_rule.key: system.run["echo '{\"data\":[' && ls -l /sys/block | tail -n +2 | awk '{print $9}' | grep -v 'ram\|loop\|sr\|fd' | sed -e 's/^/{\"{#HARDDISK}\":\"/g' | sed -e 's/$/\"}/g' | tr '\n' , | sed 's/.$//g' && echo ']}'"]

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} utilization
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='%util' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: Percentage of CPU time during which I/O requests were issued to the device (bandwidth utilization for the device). Device saturation occurs when this value is close to 100%.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} average queue size
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='avgqu-sz' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The average queue length of the requests that were issued to the device.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} average requests size
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='avgrq-sz' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The average size (in sectors) of the requests that were issued to the device.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} await
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='await' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The average time (in milliseconds) for I/O requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} read operations per second
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='r/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The number of read requests per second

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} read from device per second
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='rkB/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The number of kbytes read from the device per second

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} read requests merge per second
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='rrqm/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The number of read requests merged per second that were queued to the hard disk

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} read await
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='r_await' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The average time (in milliseconds) for read requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} write operations per second
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='w/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The number (after merges) of write requests completed per second for the device.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} written to the device per second
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='wkB/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The number of kilobytes written to the device per second.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} write requests merge per second
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='wrqm/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The number of write requests merged per second that were queued to the device.

item_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} write await
item_prototype.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='w_await' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]
item_prototype.description: The average time (in milliseconds) for write requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist:system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='%util' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"].last(3)}>75
trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#HARDDISK} is more than 75% saturated on {HOST.NAME}

item.host: Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist
item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='await' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='wrqm/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='avgqu-sz' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='avgrq-sz' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='rkB/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.host: Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist
item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='wkB/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.host: Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist
item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='%util' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.host: Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist
item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='r/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

item.host: Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist
item.key: system.run["cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | awk -v col='w/s' 'NR==1 {for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if($i==col) break} {print $1,$i}' | grep '{#HARDDISK}' | awk '{print $2}'"]

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux Iostat cmd - Jim Cronqvist:system.run["iostat -xyd 1 1 | tail -n+3 | head -n -1 2>/dev/null >> /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log && cat /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log | tr '\n' '\r' | sed -r 's/(.?*)Device(.*)/Device\2/g' | tr '\r' '\n' | tee /tmp/zabbix_iostat.log >/dev/null && echo 1 || echo 0"].last(0)}=0
trigger.name: Iostat statistics was not possible to generate on {HOSTNAME}
